lead_paragraph: The extremist group Abu Sayyaf claimed responsibility for the blast in President Rodrigo Duterte’s hometown, but other suspects are also under scrutiny.

headline.print_headline: Philippine Leader Gives Troops Police Powers After Deadly Blast
headline.main: Philippine President Extends Troops’ Powers After Deadly Explosion

snippet: The extremist group Abu Sayyaf claimed responsibility for the blast in President Rodrigo Duterte’s hometown, but other suspects are also under scrutiny....
abstract: Philippines Pres Rodrigo Duterte declares state of lawlessness and grants military more power to conduct police operations in wake of powerful bomb blast in city of Davao that killed at least 14 people and wounded over 60 others; extremist group Abu Sayyaf has claimed responsibility for blast.
